channel.title: CTRL hitter!extreamly simple!
channel.description:
all i need is a script to reapedidly hit CTRL on the keyboard. me and my friend are having a contest to see who can get to a really high level in endless online first.
if you got a script please post fast cause were starting tomarrow ;) thanks

item.title: CTRL hitter!extreamly simple!
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

Here you go.
[scar]
Program New;

Var
ControlNum: integer;

Procedure CONTROL;
Begin
KeyDown(17);
Wait(1)
KeyUp(17);
ControlNum:= ControlNum + 1
End;

Procedure Progress;
Begin
Writeln(‘You have hit control ‘+IntToStr(ControlNum)+’ times!!!’)
End;

Begin
ClearDebug;
ActivateClient;
Wait(1000)
Repeat
CONTROL;
Until isFKeyDown(8)
If isFKeyDown(8) Then
Progress;
End.[/scar]

To finish it/stop it, hit the F8 Button.

Read full topic
